abstract: New York Giants players say Carolina Panthers players taunted receiver Odell Beckham Jr with baseball bat prior to game in which Beckham committed multiple personal fouls.
lead_paragraph: A video posted on the Giants’ Instagram account showed a Carolina practice squad player carrying a black baseball, and various Panther players may have held the bat while yelling at Odell Beckham Jr.

headline.main: Beckham Was Taunted With Baseball Bat, His Teammates Say
headline.print_headline: Teammates Say Beckham Was Taunted With a Bat

snippet: A video posted on the Giants’ Instagram account showed a Carolina practice squad player carrying a black baseball, and various Panther players may have held the bat while yelling at Odell Beckham Jr.
